title: Create a Property Listing Description
description: An agent needs to write compelling marketing copy for a new property listing.

tasks.description: Retrieve the property's key features, such as number of bedrooms, bathrooms, square footage, and recent upgrades.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all relevant details about the property.

tasks.description: Generate a captivating and descriptive property description highlighting its best features and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes an engaging, grammatically correct description suitable for the MLS.

tasks.description: Format the description for the MLS, ensuring it meets character limits and compliance standards.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly formats the text for the specific MLS platform.
